original_title: 100 Years of 3D Movies Featuring the Man From M.A.R.S.
overview: 1922 saw the release of the world's first 3D movies. While the 3D version of The Man from M.A.R.S. is sadly lost, a 2D copy remains. Documentary wrap-around segments tell the story leading up to it as well as up until the digital 3D era of 2022.
title: 100 Years of 3D Movies Featuring the Man From M.A.R.S.
